content: Hey beautiful, Every moment with you feels like a beautiful dream, {wife_name}. Thinking of you always.
{wife_name}, You make my heart skip a beat every single day, {wife_name}. You make me so happy!
Just a note to say I fall more in love with you with each passing moment. Thinking of you always.
